Trade/Device Name(s): CareSens N Blood Glucose Monitoring System
Instrument(s)/Platform(s): CareSens N Meter (Model GM505IA, GM505IB, GM505IC)
Document Summary: FDA 510(k) summary for CareSens N Blood Glucose Monitoring System measuring glucose via amperometric glucose oxidase method with automatic code identification and user interface enhancements
Indications for Use Summary: Quantitative measurement of glucose in capillary whole blood as an aid in monitoring diabetes management at home or in clinical settings; in vitro diagnostic use only; not for diagnosis or screening of diabetes
